name: Highway Tanks - TC 406 and TC 406 Crude

groups.primaryKey: GRP_DNTFCTNPLT(B620_Highway Tanks - TC 406 and TC 406 Crude
GRP_FLLNGLMTS_Highway Tanks - TC 406 and TC 406 Crude

text.en: 2% Outage Volumetric Capacity per Compartment  (B621 c. 7.3(d))

groups.primaryKey: Inspection and Test Markings Take a photo and record the following: (B620 c. 7.1 Tables 7.1 - 7.2)

title.en: Hose Assemblies- Consider Rejection Criteria-( B620 c. 7.2.10, 7.2.10.4 & 7.2.10.6)

text.en: Shell and Head Rejection Criteria (B620 c. 7.2.1.8)

title.en: Double Bulkhead Drains / Piping and Protection

text.en: Internal Valves (closed), Fusible Devices, Emergency Shut-Off (B620 c. 5.6.12 & 5.7.5)
For TC 306 /406 Crude: External Valve, Fusible Devices, Emergency Shut-Off (B620 c. 5.7.6.3 & A.9)
Manhole Closures, Pressure Relief Devices,Roll Over Protection( B620 c. 5.6.6, 5.6.11, 5.7.4 & 5.6.)
MOC and hose assemblies preloading inspection done by the shipper or carrier. (B621 c. 7.1 & 7.2)
Fail-safe brake interlock system or wheel chocked. (B621 c. 7.1(h))
Loading and unloading operations under supervision. (B621 c. 7.3 & 7.6)
After loading and unloading, hatches, valves and other openings are closed & secured. (B621 c. 7.4 & 7.7)
After loading and unloading the exterior surface is clean and free of residue. (B621 c. 7.4 & 7.7)
For TC tanks –indicate the B620 edition to which the tank was built and certified with.
For a MC/DOT Tank – indicate the 49 CFR edition to which the tank was built and certified with.
